name: DianQi 典妻
description:
《Dian Qi》 is a Chinese-style horror story-oriented puzzle game. The protagonist played by the player is suddenly called back by his family in the name of recognizing his ancestors and returning to his ancestors. When he was puzzled, he suddenly discovered that everything seemed not as simple as imagined-the grievances that have been dusty for more than ten years, and the blood debt that has lasted for hundreds of years. Show them all in front of everyone.
The game uses a first-person puzzle-solving method, which not only brings an immersive plot experience, but also gives players a chance to get in touch with ghosts.
However, we all know that the most terrifying thing in this world is not ghosts, but human hearts.
Please follow us to explore the bloody truth behind the story——
Game Features:
What are the bloodstains everywhere? Can the gossip mirror really overcome the confusion? What are the writers hiding? And who is making trouble?
Your actions will change the development of the story, please be sure, choose carefully...
